channel.title: Putting server online?
channel.description:
Ok, flamers gtfo for one, I did use the fucking search button.
now to my problem, I am a great coder, I just don't host very much, I port fowarded and set the no-ip inside my clients files, but when I click runserver it just says online, but when I go on the client and try to sign in, it just says error conencting to server.

item.title: Putting server online?
item.dc:creator: @BigBadSoft BigBadSoft
item.description:
@BigBadSoft wrote:

ok my runserver.bat may be a fail because usually when people tried to connect (because I have hosted before) it would tell me when they tried to connect. but now it just says online. and thats it, add me on msn? bigbadsword@live.com

Read full topic

item.title: Putting server online?
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

TubeFish, nice failed link.

Use this link - http://status.blackout-gaming.net/

Make sure the client ip and your no-ip are the same.
But make sure you have your own client set to 127.0.0.1 or 0.0.0.0

Read full topic

item.title: Putting server online?
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

you have to set “your” client to 127.0.0.1

but others that want to sign into your server have to use your ip

try this link to see if your server is actually online—> http://google.com/?action=statuschecker

make sure you are running your server

[size=24pt]put your ip ill log into it if you would like me to[/size]
and is it 317-or 508-or 562?

Read full topic
